title: Trump's FBI pick Kash Patel passes crucial step toward confirmation
shortDescription: Despite Democrats' calls for another hearing, President Trump's nominee for FBI director will now soon be up for a vote before the entire Senate.

title: White House bars AP reporter from press briefing
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration said the Associated Press was barred from a press briefing over their style decisions around renaming the Gulf of Mexico.

title: Linda McMahon faces Congress as turmoil grips the Education Dept.
shortDescription: Linda McMahon, Trump's pick to lead the federal Education Department, is set to face questions from lawmakers Thursday morning. Here's what to know.

title: 'Total killer': Indian PM Modi set to meet with Trump
shortDescription: On Thursday, when Modi arrives in the White House, he’d be among a handful of leaders visiting Trump in the first weeks of his second presidency.

title: Tax refunds? Social Security? Elon Musk, DOGE could access your personal info
shortDescription: The courts may block efforts by Elon Musk and DOGE to access Treasury's payment system. A huge trove of private data is at the center of the fight.

title: 75,000 federal workers accept President Trump's buyouts as offer ends
shortDescription: About 75,000 federal employees accepted President Donald Trump's buyout offer, which the administration closed to applicants Wednesday night.

title: House Republicans struggle to agree on a deal to pass Trump's agenda
shortDescription: The Senate is racing ahead with its own plan as the House GOP grappled with fighting among its members.

title: Judge restores President Trump's buyouts for federal employees
shortDescription: The Trump administration stopped accepting signups on Wednesday for its "Fork in the Road" buyout offer after a judge lifted his hold on the program.

title: Trump administration sues New York over immigration
shortDescription: In her first news conference, Attorney General Pam Bondi said New York didn't heed Trump administration warnings about cracking down on immigration

title: Trump starts Ukraine talks, says he'll meet Putin in Saudi Arabia
shortDescription: The conversations signaled a new intensity and pace in the U.S. efforts to end the nearly 3-year-old war.

title: Putin invited Trump to Moscow to discuss Ukraine, Kremlin says
shortDescription: Russian President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump discussed ending the war in Ukraine, and Putin invited Trump to Moscow, the Kremlin said.

title: Eric Adams sees fortunes turn on Trump actions | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: American teacher Marc Fogel has been released by Russia after more than three years in custody. | Flu cases surge to highest levels in 15 years.

title: Trump guts foreign aid agency. Here's the global impact.
shortDescription: USAID delivers billions of dollars in aid to dozens of countries. Shuttering it means wasted food, 'free-for-all' ISIS camps, and less HIV prevention.

title: Tulsi Gabbard confirmed by Senate as national intelligence director
shortDescription: As director of national intelligence, Gabbard will oversee the U.S. intelligence community and serve as the president's top adviser on intelligence.
